smokedagger.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

smokedagger+.name: Smoke Dagger+
smokedagger+.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-6 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

sniper'sbow.name: Sniper's Bow
sniper'sbow.description: Effective against flying foes. After combat, if unit attacked, deals 7 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target, and inflicts Atk/Spd-7 on them through their next actions.
sniper'sbow.specialrefine: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat, and if unit is also within 2 spaces of support partner, foe cannot counterattack.

snow'sgrace.name: Snow's Grace
snow'sgrace.description: Neutralizes "effective against dragons" bonuses. Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during  combat. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

s\u00f6kkvabekkr.name: Sökkvabekkr
s\u00f6kkvabekkr.description: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 20 damage to nearest ally.

solkatti.name: Sol Katti
solkatti.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.
solkatti.refinedescription: If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.
solkatti.specialrefine: If unit initiates combat against a foe that can counter and unit's HP ≤ 75%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

sollance.name: Sol Lance
sollance.description: Grants Res+3. When unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 10 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

spearofshadow.name: Spear of Shadow
spearofshadow.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at start of combat, neutralizes penalties on unit and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during combat.

spectraltome.name: Spectral Tome
spectraltome.description: After combat, if unit attacked, converts bonuses on foes within 2 spaces of target into penalties through their next actions.

spectraltome+.name: Spectral Tome+
spectraltome+.description: After combat, if unit attacked, converts bonuses on foes within 2 spaces of target into penalties through their next actions.

spendthriftbow.name: Spendthrift Bow
spendthriftbow.description: Effective against flying foes. Grants Atk+7 to unit and inflicts Atk-7 on foe during combat. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on unit. (Cannot exceed the unit's maximum Special cooldown.)

spendthriftbow+.name: Spendthrift Bow+
spendthriftbow+.description: Effective against flying foes. Grants Atk+7 to unit and inflicts Atk-7 on foe during combat. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on unit. (Cannot exceed the unit's maximum Special cooldown.)

spiritbreath.name: Spirit Breath
spiritbreath.description: Grants Def+3. If unit initiates combat and unit's Def ≥ foe's Def+5, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

splashybucket.name: Splashy Bucket
splashybucket.description: Effective against dragon foes. Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and "calculate damage from staff like other weapons." After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

splashybucket+.name: Splashy Bucket+
splashybucket+.description: Effective against dragon foes. Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and "calculate damage from staff like other weapons." After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

spookycenser.name: Spooky Censer
spookycenser.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat, deals 6 damage to unit.

spookycenser+.name: Spooky Censer+
spookycenser+.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat, deals 6 damage to unit.

spy'sdagger.name: Spy's Dagger
spy'sdagger.description: After combat, if unit attacked, grants Def/Res+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn.Effect:【Dagger ６】【Dagger ６】After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-６ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
spy'sdagger.specialrefine: Grants bonus to unit's Atk = total penalties on foe during combat.

stalwartsword.name: Stalwart Sword
stalwartsword.description: If foe initiates combat, inflicts Atk-6 on foe during combat.
stalwartsword.specialrefine: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

starfish.name: Starfish
starfish.description: If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-5 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

starfish+.name: Starfish+
starfish+.description: If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

starpointlance.name: Starpoint Lance
starpointlance.description: Grants Spd+3. During unit's first combat in player phase or enemy phase, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and restores 10 HP to unit after combat.

steadylance.name: Steady Lance
steadylance.specialrefine: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

steeldagger.name: Steel Dagger
steeldagger.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-3 on foe through its next action.

stormsieglinde.name: Storm Sieglinde
stormsieglinde.description: Grants Atk+3. If the number of foes within 2 spaces (excluding target) ≥ the number of allies within 2 spaces (excluding unit), grants Def/Res+3 and Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack during combat.(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

stouttomahawk.name: Stout Tomahawk
stouttomahawk.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

sublimesurge.name: Sublime Surge
sublimesurge.description: Neutralizes "effective against dragons" bonuses. Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

summerstrikers.name: Summer Strikers
summerstrikers.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat and unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 75%. Effect:【Dagger ７】【Dagger ７】After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-７ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

summer'sbreath.name: Summer's Breath
summer'sbreath.description: Effective against dragon foes. Grants Def+3. If foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.) If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

sundragonstone.name: Sun Dragonstone
sundragonstone.description: If foe initiates combat or if a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone is not active on foe, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.
sundragonstone.specialrefine: Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

sun'spercussors.name: Sun's Percussors
sun'spercussors.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). At start of combat, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd or if foe's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit during combat and neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks.

swiftmulagir.name: Swift Mulagir
swiftmulagir.description: Effective against flying foes.Grants Res+3. If the number of allies within 2 spaces (excluding unit) > the number of foes within 2 spaces (excluding target), grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

sylgr.name: Sylgr
sylgr.description: Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

s\u00e6hr\u00edmnir.name: Sæhrímnir
s\u00e6hr\u00edmnir.description: Effective against beast foes. Grants Atk+3. At start of combat, if unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces foe's Atk/Def by 50% of difference between stats during combat. (Calculates reduction before combat. Maximum penalty of -8.) After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

tacticalbolt.name: Tactical Bolt
tacticalbolt.description: Grants weapon-triangle advantage against colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.
tacticalbolt.specialrefine: At start of turn, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

tacticalgale.name: Tactical Gale
tacticalgale.description: Grants weapon-triangle advantage against colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.
tacticalgale.specialrefine: At start of turn, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

taguelfang.name: Taguel Fang
taguelfang.description: Effective against cavalry foes. If unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat. At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

tannenbit.name: Tannenbit
tannenbit.description: When unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

tannenbit+.name: Tannenbit+
tannenbit+.description: When unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

tannenboom!.name: Tannenboom!
tannenboom!.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2 during combat.

tannenboom!+.name: Tannenboom!+
tannenboom!+.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2 during combat.

tanngrisnir.name: Tanngrisnir
tanngrisnir.description: Effective against flying foes. Grants Spd+3. If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and/or extra movement granted by a skill like Armor March or Armored Boots is active, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 and Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

temari.name: Temari
temari.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on that foe through its next action.Effect:【Dagger ５】【Dagger ５】After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-５ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

temari+.name: Temari+
temari+.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on that foe through its next action.Effect:【Dagger ７】【Dagger ７】After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-７ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

thani.name: Thani
thani.description: Effective against armored and cavalry foes. Grants Res+3. If armored or cavalry foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30%.

tharja'shex.name: Tharja's Hex
tharja'shex.description: Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on unit during combat.
tharja'shex.specialrefine: Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

thecleaner.name: The Cleaner
thecleaner.description: Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on foe during combat. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-5 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

thecleaner+.name: The Cleaner+
thecleaner+.description: Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on foe during combat. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

th\u00f6gn.name: Thögn
th\u00f6gn.description: Effective against flying foes.Grants Spd+3. If unit initiates combat and foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

th\u00f6kk.name: Thökk
th\u00f6kk.description: Calculates damage from staff like other weapons.At start of turn, if foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3 and foe is in cardinal direction and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, foe cannot move more than 1 space through its action.

thornlance.name: Thorn Lance
thornlance.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). At start of combat, if unit's Atk > foe's Atk, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

thunderarmads.name: Thunder Armads
thunderarmads.description: Grants Def+3. If the number of allies within 2 spaces (excluding unit) > the number of foes within 2 spaces (excluding target), foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

thunderhead.name: Thunderhead
thunderhead.description: Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on unit during combat.
thunderhead.specialrefine: If unit or ally initiates combat against a foe within 2 spaces of unit, inflicts Spd/Res-5 on that foe during combat.

toastyskewer.name: Toasty Skewer
toastyskewer.description: If a foe initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, grants Def/Res+3 to that ally during combat.

toastyskewer+.name: Toasty Skewer+
toastyskewer+.description: If a foe initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, grants Def/Res+3 to that ally during combat.

tomatotome.name: Tomato Tome
tomatotome.description: Grants Atk/Spd+1 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

tomatotome+.name: Tomato Tome+
tomatotome+.description: Grants Atk/Spd+1 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

tomeofthoron.name: Tome of Thoron
tomeofthoron.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.
tomeofthoron.specialrefine: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

trilemma.name: Trilemma
trilemma.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts the following status on foe through its next action: "If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%."

trilemma+.name: Trilemma+
trilemma+.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts the following status on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions: "If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%."

tropicaltreats.name: Tropical Treats
tropicaltreats.description: If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone is active on unit, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.Effect:【Dagger ５】【Dagger ５】After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-５ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

tropicaltreats+.name: Tropical Treats+
tropicaltreats+.description: If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone is active on unit, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.Effect:【Dagger ７】【Dagger ７】After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-７ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

tyrfing.name: Tyrfing
tyrfing.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+4 during combat.
tyrfing.refinedescription: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants: “If unit’s HP > 1 and foe would reduce unit’s HP to 0, unit survives with 1 HP. (Once per combat. Does not stack.)”
tyrfing.specialrefine: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+5 during combat.

umbraburst(axe).name: Umbra Burst (axe)
umbraburst(axe).description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. Deals a minimum of 1 damage.

umbraburst(bow).name: Umbra Burst (bow)
umbraburst(bow).description: Effective against flying foes. Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. Deals a minimum of 1 damage.

umbraburst(dagger).name: Umbra Burst (dagger)
umbraburst(dagger).description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. Deals a minimum of 1 damage.Effect:【Dagger ７】【Dagger ７】After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-７ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

umbraburst(dragonstone).name: Umbra Burst (dragonstone)
umbraburst(dragonstone).description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res. Deals a minimum of 1 damage.

umbraburst(lance).name: Umbra Burst (lance)
umbraburst(lance).description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. Deals a minimum of 1 damage.

umbraburst(magic).name: Umbra Burst (magic)
umbraburst(magic).description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. Deals a minimum of 1 damage.

umbraburst(staff).name: Umbra Burst (staff)
umbraburst(staff).description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. Calculates damage from staff like other weapons. Deals a minimum of 1 damage.

umbraburst(sword).name: Umbra Burst (sword)
umbraburst(sword).description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. Deals a minimum of 1 damage.

urvan.name: Urvan
urvan.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit receives consecutive attacks, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 80%.
urvan.specialrefine: Reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40%. If foe initiates combat, foe can make a follow-up attack before unit can counterattack.

ur\u00f0r.name: Urðr
ur\u00f0r.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 to target.

vaf\u00fer\u00fa\u00f0nir.name: Vafþrúðnir
vaf\u00fer\u00fa\u00f0nir.description: Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

valaskj\u00e1lf.name: Valaskjálf
valaskj\u00e1lf.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50% and foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack.

valflame.name: Valflame
valflame.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

vanguard.name: Vanguard
vanguard.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+7 during combat.

vanguard+.name: Vanguard+
vanguard+.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+7 during combat.

vassal'sblade.name: Vassal's Blade
vassal'sblade.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, deals damage = 70% of difference between stats. (Maximum bonus of +7 damage. Combos with Phantom Spd.)

veninedge.name: Venin Edge
veninedge.description: Grants Def+3. After combat, if unit attacked, deals 10 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target, and inflicts status on those foes preventing counterattacks through their next actions.

ver\u00f0andi.name: Verðandi
ver\u00f0andi.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to target.

vesselofcheer.name: Vessel of Cheer
vesselofcheer.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

vesselofcheer+.name: Vessel of Cheer+
vesselofcheer+.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

veteranlance.name: Veteran Lance
veteranlance.description: If foe initiates combat or, at start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 70%, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat.
veteranlance.specialrefine: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk-7 on that foe through its next action.

ve\u00f0rf\u00f6lnir'segg.name: Veðrfölnir's Egg
ve\u00f0rf\u00f6lnir'segg.description: Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 75%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

victoriousaxe.name: Victorious Axe
victoriousaxe.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If the number of foes within 2 spaces (excluding target) ≥ the number of allies within 2 spaces (excluding unit), unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

vidofnir.name: Vidofnir
vidofnir.description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, or axe, grants Def+7 during combat.
vidofnir.refinedescription: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+7 during combat.
vidofnir.specialrefine: If unit is within 2 spaces of an infantry or armored ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

virtuousnaga.name: Virtuous Naga
virtuousnaga.description: Effective against dragon foes. Grants Atk+3. At start of combat, if unit's Atk > foe's Atk, grants Atk/Res+6 during combat.

virtuoustyrfing.name: Virtuous Tyrfing
virtuoustyrfing.description: Grants Res+3. If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP < 100% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during combat, and if unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

voidtome.name: Void Tome
voidtome.description: Grants Atk+3. At start of combat, if foe's Atk ≥ 50 or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Def/Res+5 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if foe's Spd ≥ 35 or if【Penalty】is active on foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.【Penalty】All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

vouge.name: Vouge
vouge.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

wagasa.name: Wagasa
wagasa.description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

wagasa+.name: Wagasa+
wagasa+.description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

wargod'stome.name: Wargod's Tome
wargod'stome.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

warriorprincess.name: Warrior Princess
warriorprincess.description: Effective against flying and armored foes. Grants Spd+3. Grants Atk+3 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

waterbreath.name: Water Breath
waterbreath.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

waterbreath+.name: Water Breath+
waterbreath+.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

weightedlance.name: Weighted Lance
weightedlance.specialrefine: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Def/Res+4 and Special cooldown charge +1 per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack. Special cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack deals 0 damage.)

weirdingtome.name: Weirding Tome
weirdingtome.description: Grants Spd+3. At start of turn, inflicts Spd-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.
weirdingtome.refinedescription: Grants Spd+3. At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd/Res-5 on that foe through its next action.
weirdingtome.specialrefine: If【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.【Penalty】All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

whelp(armored).name: Whelp (Armored)
whelp(armored).description: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

whelp(cavalry).name: Whelp (Cavalry)
whelp(cavalry).description: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

whelp(infantry).name: Whelp (Infantry)
whelp(infantry).description: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

whitedownspear.name: Whitedown Spear
whitedownspear.description: Grants Atk+3. If the number of flying units on team ≥ 3 and unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. If the number of flying allies within 2 spaces ≥ 2 and unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

whitewingblade.name: Whitewing Blade
whitewingblade.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.
whitewingblade.specialrefine: If the number of flying allies within 2 spaces ≥ 2, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat, and if unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

whitewinglance.name: Whitewing Lance
whitewinglance.specialrefine: If the number of flying allies within 2 spaces ≥ 2, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat, and if unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

whitewingspear.name: Whitewing Spear
whitewingspear.specialrefine: If the number of flying allies within 2 spaces ≥ 2, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat, and if unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

wind'sbrand.name: Wind's Brand
wind'sbrand.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.
wind'sbrand.specialrefine: During combat, boosts unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res by number of adjacent allies × 2.

windsofchange.name: Winds of Change
windsofchange.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). Effective against flying foes. At start of combat, if a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone is active on unit or if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Spd+5 and neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

windsofsilesse.name: Winds of Silesse
windsofsilesse.description: Grants Spd+3. If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat.

wingsword.name: Wing Sword
wingsword.description: Effective against armored and cavalry foes.
wingsword.specialrefine: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

witchywand.name: Witchy Wand
witchywand.description: After combat, if unit attacked, resets Special cooldown of foe, and inflicts the following status on foe through its next action: "Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)" (Neutralizes Special cooldown count reductions after combat, but skills that Accelerate and Slow Special are still effective.)

witchywand+.name: Witchy Wand+
witchywand+.description: After combat, if unit attacked, resets Special cooldown of target and foes within 2 spaces of target, and inflicts the following status on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions: "Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)" (Neutralizes Special cooldown count reductions after combat, but skills that Accelerate and Slow Special are still effective.)

wolfberg.name: Wolf Berg
wolfberg.description: Grants Def+3. If the number of foes within 2 spaces (excluding target) ≥ the number of allies within 2 spaces (excluding unit), grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

wolfqueenfang.name: Wolf Queen Fang
wolfqueenfang.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).During combat, boosts unit's Atk/Spd by number of allies within 2 spaces × 2. (Maximum bonus of +6 to each stat.) At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

wolfpupfang.name: Wolfpup Fang
wolfpupfang.description: Grants Spd+3. At the start of turn 1, grants special cooldown count-2 to unit and unit's support partner (if any). At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

wolfskinfang.name: Wolfskin Fang
wolfskinfang.description: Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice. (Even if foe initiates combat, unit attacks twice.) At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

worldseawave.name: Worldsea Wave
worldseawave.description: Grants Spd+3. If unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

yato.name: Yato
yato.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.
yato.specialrefine: If unit is within 2 spaces of support partner, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to that ally during combat.

yearling(arm.).name: Yearling (Arm.)
yearling(arm.).description: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

yearling(cavalry).name: Yearling (Cavalry)
yearling(cavalry).description: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

yearling(infantry).name: Yearling (Infantry)
yearling(infantry).description: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

zanbato+.name: Zanbato+
zanbato+.specialrefine: Neutralizes cavalry foes' bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

zephyrbreath.name: Zephyr Breath
zephyrbreath.description: Effective against armored foes. Grants Res+3. If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone is active on unit or if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, neutralizes unit's penalties and inflicts Atk-6 on foe during combat, and foe cannot make a follow-up attack. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.
